server.DAO

Class AbstractDAOUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.DAO.AbstractDAOUser
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SQLServerDAOUser

    public abstract class AbstractDAOUser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the abstract class for the DAO user

        This method closes a connection to a database.

      • createDAOUser

        public abstract int createDAOUser(java.lang.String name,
                                  java.lang.String firstName,
                                  java.lang.String birthDate,
                                  java.lang.String email,
                                  java.lang.String password,
                                  java.lang.String role,
                                  java.lang.String jobType)
        This method create a user in the data base
        Parameters:
        name - : user name
        firstName - : user first name
        birthDate - : user birth date
        email - : user login
        password - : user password
        role - : user role
        jobType - : the user job type.
        Returns:
        0 or 1 depending if the creation failed or succeeded.

      • readDAOUser

        public abstract UserType readDAOUser(int id)
        Reads the DB and retrieves the user by its ID
        Parameters:
        id - the user ID in the DB
        Returns:
        a user description.

      • updateDAOUser

        public abstract int updateDAOUser(int id,
                                  java.lang.String name,
                                  java.lang.String firstName,
                                  java.lang.String email,
                                  java.lang.String birthDate,
                                  java.lang.String role)
        This method updates a user in the DAO with its ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the user ID
        name - the user name
        firstName - the user first name
        birthDate - the user birth date
        email - the user email
        role - the user role
        Returns:
        0 or 1 depending if the update failed or succeeded.

      • deleteDAOUser

        public abstract int deleteDAOUser(int id,
                                  java.lang.String role)
        Reads the DB and delete the user.
        Parameters:
        id - the user ID.
        role - the user role.
        Returns:
        0 or 1 depending if the deletion failed or succeeded.

      • readDAOUserByLogin

        public abstract int readDAOUserByLogin(java.lang.String login,
                                       java.lang.String password)
        Reads the DB and retrieves the user by its login and password. Returns -1 if the email or password is null
        Parameters:
        login: - the email of the user
        password: - the password of the user
        Returns:
        the ID if successful, -1 otherwise

      • isPdwNull

        public abstract boolean isPdwNull(java.lang.String login)
        Checks the DB for a user, to see if its password is null or not.
        Parameters:
        login: - the email of the user.
        Returns:
        boolean, true if the user's password is null, false otherwise.

      • setNewPwd

        public abstract boolean setNewPwd(java.lang.String login,
                                  java.lang.String password)
        Checks the DB and asks to set a new password to the client.
        Parameters:
        login: - the email of the client. Since it is personal, there can't be two same emails.
        password: - the new client's password.
        Returns:
        true if the change has been successful, false otherwise.
